gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 108, Grizzlies 102
gameRecap.excerpt: The Heat defeated the Grizzlies, 108-102. Bam Adebayo led the way for the Heat with 30 points and 11 rebounds, while Kyle Lowry added 17 points, 11 rebounds and nine assists in the victory. Jaren Jackson Jr. tallied 28 points and four rebounds for the Grizzlies in the losing effort. The Heat improve to 4-4 on the season, while the Grizzlies fall to 1-7.
